about_the_game:
Tyler Warren is back again with something you haven’t seen before. These 50 monster silhouettes are perfect for adding some horror/mystery and depth to your next project. These images are multifunctional and can be used as battlers, logos, or incorporated into other ambience within your game world. Specifically designed with form and shape in mind, these monsters have character all their own.

Features:

  • 50 unique silhouettes for use at battlers, logos, or ambience
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MZ
  • All 50 silhouettes are presented in a range of sizes from large to tiny
  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) for RPG Maker MZ
  • Use these with Tyler’s other 200+ battlers to add a variety of exciting characters to your next RPG Maker Project!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 5th 50" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 5th 50" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
